action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two attacks with its greatsword or hurls two rocks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point it can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
